sentence.Network_en: Results. The patient was decompressed and stabilized from dorsally, and a biopsy was taken.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果: 病人接受了俯卧位的减压和固定术以及活检.

sentence.Network_en: Dorsally, the starting point is just proximal to the standard 3 - 4 radiocarpal arthroscopy portal.
sentence.Network_cn: 背侧入路时, 进入点刚好接近于标准桡腕关节镜3-4号入口处.

list.abs: 上方一枚为中萼片(dorsal sepal)，又称“顶瓣”、“主瓣”。两侧各一片为侧萼片(lateral sepals)，又称“副瓣”。

auth_sentence.content: Long and slender, the blue whale's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.

auth_sentence.content: The female often has a stripe along the spine and dark sides, while the male may have blue spots dorsally.
